title: A Man Thrashing for Acorns; Zodiacal Sign of Sagittarius
description: A Man Thrashing for Acorns; Zodiacal Sign of Sagittarius; Workshop of the Bedford Master (French, active first half of 15th century); Paris, France; about 1440 - 1450; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 23.5 x 16.4 cm (9 1/4 x 6 7/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 6, fol. 11; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
